name: quartz-wiki-wrapper
description: Publish an existing Obsidian vault (or subfolder) as a Quartz static site

scripts.dev: node scripts/ensure-wrapper-ready.mjs && node scripts/ensure-quartz-ready.mjs --install && npm run config:quartz:dev && npm run sync && node scripts/run-quartz.mjs build --serve
scripts.build: node scripts/ensure-wrapper-ready.mjs && node scripts/ensure-quartz-ready.mjs --install && npm run config:quartz && npm run sync && npm run snapshot:content && node scripts/run-quartz.mjs build
